app_sentences.en: We will discuss our project plan in the next class.
app_sentences.cn: 我们将在下节课讨论我们的项目计划。

app_sentences.en: Let's discuss the plan for the class trip together.
app_sentences.cn: 让我们一起讨论班级旅行的计划。

data.meaning: vt. 接受、承认、同意；vi. 同意

app_sentences.en: I gladly accept your invitation to your birthday party.
app_sentences.cn: 我很高兴接受你生日派对的邀请。

data.meaning: vt. 授予、给予；n. 奖品、裁定、判决

app_sentences.en: She received an award for her excellent science project.
app_sentences.cn: 她因其出色的科学项目而获得了一个奖项。

data.meaning: vt. 用...作交换；vi. 交易、做买卖；n. 交通、通行、运输

app_sentences.en: The traffic in the city centre is very heavy during rush hour.
app_sentences.cn: 高峰时段市中心的交通非常拥堵。

data.meaning: adj. 未勘查过的

app_sentences.en: There are still many unexplored places deep in the rainforest.
app_sentences.cn: 雨林深处仍有许多未被探索的地方。

data.meaning: adv. 严肃地、认真地、严重地

app_sentences.en: You should take your studies seriously to get good results.
app_sentences.cn: 你应该认真对待你的学习以取得好成绩。

data.meaning: vt. 完成、达到；vi. 如愿以偿

app_sentences.en: With hard work, you can achieve your goals in life.
app_sentences.cn: 通过努力，你可以实现你的人生目标。

app_sentences.en: With enough practice, you can achieve your goal of swimming well.
app_sentences.cn: 通过足够的练习，你可以达到游好泳的目标。

data.meaning: adj. 地理学的、地理的

app_sentences.en: We learned about the geographical features of Asia in class.
app_sentences.cn: 我们在课堂上学习了亚洲的地理特征。

data.meaning: n. 发现、被发现的事物；要求告知、发现、发觉

app_sentences.en: The discovery of penicillin was very important for medicine.
app_sentences.cn: 青霉素的发现对医学非常重要。

data.meaning: vt. 使竖起、使达到最高点；vi. 到达最高点、消瘦、变憔悴；n. 山峰、巅、山顶

app_sentences.en: We reached the mountain peak after a long and difficult climb.
app_sentences.cn: 经过漫长而艰难的攀登，我们到达了山顶。

data.meaning: n. 事实、实情；真实、真相、事实

app_sentences.en: Always tell the truth, even when it is difficult to do so.
app_sentences.cn: 永远要说实话，即使这样做很困难。

app_sentences.en: You should always tell the truth to your parents and teachers.
app_sentences.cn: 你应该永远对父母和老师说真话。

data.meaning: v. 攀登、上升、爬；n. 攀登、爬升

app_sentences.en: It took us two hours to climb to the top of the hill.
app_sentences.cn: 我们花了两个小时爬到了小山顶。

app_sentences.en: They like to climb mountains to enjoy the fresh air.
app_sentences.cn: 他们喜欢爬山以享受新鲜空气。
